component.name: MuseScore
component.summary: Free music composition and notation software

description.p: MuseScore is an open source and free music notation software. For support, contribution & bug reports, visit MuseScore.org.

ul.li: WYSIWYG design, notes are entered on a "virtual notepaper"
TrueType font(s) for printing & display allows for high quality scaling to all sizes
Integrated sequencer and software synthesizer to play the score
